p: A detailed review of the chemical modifications occurring during germination has been given in Section 2. Many of those modifications behave like the human digestion process [ 234] and implicate an improved availability of macro- and micro-nutrients as confirmed by several in vitro and in vivo studies [ 11, 232]. Therefore, sprouted grains are a complex food matrix, where nutrients are nearly fully available, rich in various antioxidant and bioactive compounds, representing health promoting food.
